headline: Assessing Universal Health Services (NYSE:UHS) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why Universal Health Services is on investors’ radar today Universal Health Services (UHS) has attracted fresh attention after recent trading, with the share price at $234.81 and a mix of short term and longer term returns that many investors are reassessing. See our latest analysis for Universal Health Services. Recent gains have been steady rather than abrupt.
